description: Aviation Replacement Parts for the Various Aircrafts
full_summary:
## Solicitation: W8485-247678/A

### Aviation Replacement Parts for Various Aircrafts

The Department of National Defense (DND) seeks to acquire replacement parts for various aircrafts under the Supply Arrangement (SA) W8485-184741 Series.

#### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

The procurement notice outlines a request for proposals from qualified SA holders. The following companies have been invited to submit proposals:

* B S F (Business Solutions Fasteners) International Inc.
* Bristow
* Kenn Borek Air
* Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc.
* CASP
* Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.
* Canada West Avionics
* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* Simex Defence Inc.
* Unisource Technology Inc.

#### Tender Description

The procurement is open to qualified SA holders and solicits proposals for supply arrangement W8485-184741 Series. Bidders should be aware that the RFP documents will be distributed by the Contracting Authority directly to eligible SA holders, not through the Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS).

Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement should be submitted to the Contracting Authority:

* Kuangyun Xu
* Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
* Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
* Gatineau, QC, J8Y 6V7
* Email: Kuangyun.Xu@forces.gc.ca

#### Qualified Suppliers

A notice will be posted annually on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series. Interested suppliers may submit their request to the Supply Arrangement Authority:

* Jessica Lepinski, Supply Team Leader
* Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada
* Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector
* Civilian Aircraft Division - CAG

#### Contact Information

Contracting Entity:
* Department of National Defense
* 455 Boul de la Carriere
* Gatineau, QC, J8Y 6V7
* Telephone: (819) 939-4320
* Email: June.Cole@forces.gc.ca

Please note that the Contracting Entity is currently teleworking due to COVID-19, and the best way to contact them is by email.

#### Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: W8485-247678/A
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-07T14:
